org.apache.taverna.annotation

Interface Annotated<TargetType>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Activity<ConfigurationType>, ActivityInputPort, ActivityOutputPort, ActivityPort, AsynchronousActivity<ConfigurationType>, Condition, Dataflow, DataflowInputPort, DataflowOutputPort, DataflowPort, Datalink, DispatchStack, EventForwardingOutputPort, EventHandlingInputPort, FilteringInputPort, InputPort, MergeInputPort, MergeOutputPort, MergePort, MonitorableAsynchronousActivity<ConfigType>, OutputPort, Port, Processor, ProcessorInputPort, ProcessorOutputPort, ProcessorPort, SupersededActivity<ConfigurationType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActivity, AbstractAnnotatedThing, AbstractAsynchronousActivity, AbstractEventHandlingInputPort, AbstractFilteringInputPort, AbstractOutputPort, AbstractPort, ActivityInputPortImpl, ActivityOutputPortImpl, BasicEventForwardingOutputPort, DataflowActivity, DataflowImpl, DataflowInputPortImpl, DisabledActivity, DispatchStackImpl, NonExecutableActivity, ProcessorImpl, StringConstantActivity, UnrecognizedActivity

    public interface Annotated<TargetType>
    Denotes that the object carries workflow object level annotation. Rather than defining specific annotation types for each workflow entity we work on the basis that multiple annotations of different types may apply, so free text description is one example, semantic annotation of the internal function of a processor might be another.

    Where annotations are conceptually editable such as free text descriptions the editing framework should internally remove the original annotation and add the replacement rather than modifying the previous annotation in place.

      • getAnnotations

        Set<? extends AnnotationChain> getAnnotations()
        Each annotated object contains a bag of metadata object instances
        Returns:
        set of metadata objects that apply to the annotated object

        void setAnnotations(Set<AnnotationChain> annotations)

      • getAddAnnotationEdit

        Edit<? extends TargetType> getAddAnnotationEdit(AnnotationChain newAnnotation)
        Add new workflow object metadata to this annotated entity
        Type Parameters:
        TargetType - the type of the object being annotated
        Parameters:
        newAnnotation - metadata object to add to the annotated object
        Returns:
        edit object to perform and undo the metadata assignment

      • getRemoveAnnotationEdit

        Edit<? extends TargetType> getRemoveAnnotationEdit(AnnotationChain annotationToRemove)
        Remove an annotation object from the this annotated entity
        Type Parameters:
        TargetType - type of the workflow object from which the annotation is removed
        Parameters:
        annotationToRemove - metadata object to remove
        objectToAnnotate - object from which the metadata is removed
        Returns:
        edit object to perform and undo the metadata removal
